overview: Window was made in response to the first Australia-wide COVID-19 related lockdown in 2020. Taking inspiration from Hitchcockâ€™s Rear Window, each filmmaker contributed one roll of black and white celluloid film shot through a window of their house, documenting the visual aspects particular to their confinement. Together, these films form a portrait of domestic isolation, collectively examining the cinematic potential of the contemporary social order.
title: Window
